title: Citation for AI Brainstorm
scenario: You used an AI tool to brainstorm essay ideas and kept some phrasing.

choices.text: Submit without mention
choices.feedback: Lack of disclosure risks integrity issues.

choices.text: Note AI use in acknowledgments with prompt details
choices.feedback: Transparent and aligns with citation guidance.

choices.text: Rewrite everything from memory and cite nothing

title: Sensitive Data in Prompts
scenario: You need feedback on a draft email containing classmates’ phone numbers.

choices.text: Paste the full email into a public AI tool
Replace phone numbers with placeholders before pasting

title: Checking AI Facts
scenario: AI provides a historical date that seems off.

choices.text: Trust the AI because it sounded confident
Verify in two reliable sources before using
Skip verification but add a citation anyway

title: Group Project Boundaries
scenario: Team policy allows AI for brainstorming, not for final writing.

choices.text: Use AI to draft the full report
Use AI for outline ideas, then write yourselves
choices.feedback: Follows policy and credits AI brainstorming.

choices.text: Keep using results as-is
Document the bias and seek more representative data

title: AI and Academic Sources
scenario: AI suggests a citation you can't find anywhere.

choices.text: Use it because it fits your point
Exclude it and find a real source

title: Prompt Guardrails
scenario: You want AI-generated practice questions without fake citations.

choices.text: Ask for questions and sources, no caveats
Ask for questions and instruct the AI to admit uncertainty instead of fabricating sources

title: Sharing AI Outputs
scenario: You plan to post AI-generated art with your name.

choices.text: Post without mentioning AI
Credit the AI tool and your edits in the caption

title: Storing Prompts
scenario: You keep prompts with classmates’ names in cloud notes.

choices.text: Store them unredacted
Remove names or store locally with access controls

title: Course Policy Check
scenario: Syllabus is unclear about AI use.

choices.text: Assume AI is allowed for everything
Ask instructor and document the response
choices.feedback: Clarifies expectations and supports proper attribution.
